<a id="class_StyleBoxLine"></a>

# StyleBoxLine

**Inherits:** [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) that displays a single line of a given color and thickness.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) that displays a single line of a given color and thickness. The line can be either horizontal or vertical. Useful for separators.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_StyleBoxLine_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxLine_property_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_color**\ (\ )

The line's color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxLine_property_grow_begin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **grow_begin** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxLine_property_grow_begin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_grow_begin**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_grow_begin**\ (\ )

The number of pixels the line will extend before the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds. If set to a negative value, the line will begin inside the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxLine_property_grow_end"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **grow_end** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxLine_property_grow_end)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_grow_end**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_grow_end**\ (\ )

The number of pixels the line will extend past the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds. If set to a negative value, the line will end inside the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxLine_property_thickness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **thickness** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxLine_property_thickness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_thickness**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_thickness**\ (\ )

The line's thickness in pixels.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxLine_property_vertical"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **vertical** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxLine_property_vertical)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertical**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_vertical**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the line will be vertical. If ``false``, the line will be horizontal.
